description: Binda Pandey is a Nepalese politician affiliated with the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist). She was a member of the 1st Nepalese Constituent Assembly and has been a central figure in the trade union movement, serving as Deputy General Secretary of the General Federation of Nepalese Trade Unions (GEFONT). Pandey is also a prominent advocate for women's rights, having served on the National Women Commission and as a Deputy Member of the ILO Governing Body. She holds a PhD in Education and has authored several books, including 'Women in Nepali Politics'.
short_description: Nepalese politician, gender and workers' rights expert, and trade unionist.
